attributes.name: destination
attributes.description: A reference/Id to where the published copy should be added.

attributes.name: linkDestination
attributes.description: A reference/Id to where a link to the published document should be added.

attributes.name: wrapper
attributes.description: A blueprint for which an entity of will serve as a wrapper for the published document

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: A text to inform the user what the publish action does

attributes.name: mode
attributes.description: Which mode the publish plugin should operate in. One of 'copy' | 'link'| 'copy&link'

attributes.name: wrapperAttribute
attributes.description: Name of attribute in the 'publishWrapper'-blueprint of which the document will be placed.
